pma:database.name: db_site
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `Tcomments` ( `idquestion` int(11) NOT NULL, `ref` text NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), `rank` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `seen` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, UNIQUE KEY `time` (`time`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tgrades` ( `idsemester` int(11) NOT NULL, `moed` varchar(1) NOT NULL, `avg` double NOT NULL, `num` int(11) NOT NULL, `grades` text NOT NULL, `proj2` text DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `idsemester` (`idsemester`,`moed`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `TgradesSemesters` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `lecture` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `year` varchar(4) NOT NULL, `semester` varchar(1) NOT NULL, `proj` text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`,`lecture`,`year`,`semester`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=87 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tkdams` ( `link` text NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `lecture` text DEFAULT NULL, `ids` text NOT NULL, `pts` int(11) NOT NULL, `year` text NOT NULL, `note` text NOT NULL, `kdams` text DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `link` (`link`) USING HASH ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tlinks` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title_cap` text NOT NULL, `href_cap` text NOT NULL, `img_cap` text NOT NULL, `more_data` text NOT NULL, `hidden` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=894 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tquestions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `course` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `lecture` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `tag` text NOT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), `rank` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `unique_index` (`course`,`lecture`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tteachers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lecture` text NOT NULL, `tag` text NOT NULL, `rank` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `study` text NOT NULL, `phone` text NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `hidden` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Tusers` ( `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `degree` int(11) NOT NULL, `year` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `connected` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `password` text DEFAULT NULL, `msg` text DEFAULT NULL, `last_dir` text DEFAULT NULL, `sendmail` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (`email`), KEY `email` (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `Twhatsapp` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title_cap` text NOT NULL, `href_cap` text NOT NULL, `lecture` text DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2023302 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
